invalid-token.message: Invalid token. Please provide a valid authentication token.

invalid-request.message: Invalid data provided. Please check the input values.

invalid-request-type.message: Invalid request type. This endpoint only supports specific methods (e.g., GET, POST).

user-not-found.message: The requested user was not found in the system.

user-already-exists.message: The user already exists. Please try a different email or username.

invalid-credentials.message: Authentication failed. Please check your credentials and try again.

missing-parameters.message: Required parameters are missing. Please ensure all necessary data is provided.

account-locked.message: Your account has been locked due to multiple failed login attempts. Please reset your password or contact support.

internal-server-error.message: An unexpected error occurred on the server. Please try again later.

rate-limit-exceeded.message: You have made too many requests in a short period. Please wait and try again later.
